title: WTB 1910 Obak Perry to complete team
author: Mark Morris

posts.post_title: WTB 1910 Obak Perry to complete team
posts.post_content: Need the 1910 Obak 175 series Perry card to complete my Sacramento team. Help me reunite these Sacramento Old Ghosts with my great-grandfather Spider Baum. Email me at [url]mmorris@sacbee.com[/url]
